Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

Columns.Description: The FQDN of the host.

Columns.Description: The time (UTC) the event was added.
Columns.Name: AddedTime

Columns.Description: The time (UTC) the application was removed.

Columns.Description: The max memory usage from the event.

Columns.Description: The max on heap memory usage from the event.
Columns.Name: MaxOnHeapMemory

Columns.Description: The max off heap memory usage from the event.
Columns.Name: MaxOffHeapMemory

Columns.Description: The tenant ID of the cluster the Block Manager is running on.

Columns.Description: The type of node the Block Manager is running on.

Columns.Description: The DNS name of the cluster the Block Manager is running on.

Columns.Description: The region of the cluster the Block Manager is running on.

Columns.Description: The IP Address of the node the Block Manager is running on.

Columns.Description: The subscription ID of the cluster the Block Manager is running on.

Columns.Description: The block host.
Columns.Name: BlockHost

Columns.Description: The host where the Block Manager is running.
